name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Massachusetts now ranks first among states with 5 million people or more for total COVID-19 vaccine doses administered.  We look forward to continuing to vaccinate more of our residents in the weeks and months ahead.  https://t.co/yg6lng0bwX

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Vaccination locations and appointments are being added all the time. Visit  https://t.co/qErxGsPR0s to:  📝 Check if you are eligible to get the vaccine 🔍 Use the COVID-19 Vaccine Finder to schedule your appointment ✅ Get ready for your appointment  ➡️  https://t.co/aqwpmg2e60  https://t.co/HNeBVBbo2m

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today we're launching the COVID-19 Vaccine Finder, to make it easier to find vaccination locations and view key info like:  📅 Available appointments 📝 Site instructions 🚇 Directions + @MBTA trip planner  Find the tool at  https://t.co/aqwpmfKCHq OR:  ➡️  https://t.co/FmQKtFEQXF  https://t.co/LPwZbi9TRH

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Besides putting COVID in the rearview mirror once and for all, my biggest wish for 2021 is for all of us to take Walt Whitman’s charge to heart.   Be curious – not judgmental.   #MASOTC  https://t.co/9jVIF3pUWZ

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: While COVID returned this fall with a vengeance, here in Massachusetts, we are seeing our way through it...and schools remain open.  Study after study makes clear that kids need to be in school. Their educational and emotional development depends on it.   #MASOTC  https://t.co/1Z18u34QaG

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: We also announced a change to our distribution timeline: Adults 65+ have been moved up within Phase 2, to the second priority group (after adults 75+). Phase 2 begins next month.  📲 Sign up at  https://t.co/rIl1o6stq0 to get COVID-19 updates including when we move to a new phase.  https://t.co/W9W37scTFn

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today's #COVID19MA vaccine announcements:   🏪 MA will become one of the first states in the nation to launch the COVID-19 CDC Pharmacy Partnership.   Starting this week, the program will deliver a total of 10,000 doses to at least @cvspharmacy and @Walgreens pharmacies per week.  https://t.co/8WoU3BkZek

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our #COVID19MA vaccine distribution plan starts with both clinical and non-clinical workers in health care settings doing direct COVID-facing work.  That includes workers like Sophal "Paula" Soth, who has served Shattuck Hospital for 30 years.  ➡️  https://t.co/aqwpmg2e60

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: The #COVID19MA vaccine continues to arrive in Massachusetts, including at @MassDPH's state lab.   MA's first vaccinations are being done at hospitals, for clinical and non-clinical workers engaging in direct COVID-facing work.  ➡️ MORE:  https://t.co/aqwpmg2e60

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today I joined @GovLarryHogan, @GovPhilScott, @GovChrisSununu + Gov. @AsaHutchinson to urge Congress to pass a bipartisan agreement on a COVID-19 relief package this month.  Families, businesses and communities need Washington to come together and act.  https://t.co/yFasanMRPH

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Stopping #COVID19MA spread means everyone must do their part to avoid gatherings and wear a mask. Thanks to @CohassetPolice for enforcing state guidelines + doing their part to protect the community.  ➡️More about COVID-19 policies:  https://t.co/qI3H4jpJ0o  https://t.co/NnPQyjXXJi

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: ...that can work collaboratively to fight COVID-19, rebuild our economy and give people hope that there will be a positive path forward.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Massachusetts is battling COVID-19 and reopening responsibly - we have and will hold fair elections.   Thanks to thousands of volunteers, these sacred pillars of our republic will take place. There is no question.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: On Monday, @pfizer began the last stage, or phase 3, of an experimental COVID-19 vaccine study that seeks to enroll 30,000 people.  Their team here in Andover has been working on the development, manufacturing and testing of a potential COVID-19 vaccine.  #COVID19MA  https://t.co/R5dxkY4uB7

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Massachusetts has always been a leader in innovation and we’re lucky to have some of the best and brightest minds in research + medicine in our backyard.  Today @MassLtGov + I returned to @pfizer's Andover campus to learn about their work to develop a COVID-19 vaccine candidate.  https://t.co/dLHSnY6e6X

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Learn more from @MassDPH about key #COVID19MA testing resources. You can be tested if you show any symptoms of COVID-19 or are a close contact of someone who has tested positive. You can find a testing site near you using our site map.  ➡️Learn more:  https://t.co/maMyBP3c2e  https://t.co/EBuRdEHH6h

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our emergency response to the COVID-19 outbreak stabilized conditions for residents and staff, and we now have an accurate picture of what went wrong and will take immediate action to deliver the level of care that our veterans deserve.  🔗Read more:  https://t.co/mvHtPGUmr0

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Glad to visit @BIDMChealth with @SecAzar to tour COVID-19 test kit assembly areas and primary care practice.  Massachusetts' response to #COVID19MA has been driven by our world class health care system, anchored by institutions like Beth Israel.  ▶️WATCH:  https://t.co/vK6i6iHIx8  https://t.co/HAIO5gG2P3

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our nation-leading contact tracing initiative with @PIH continues to connect with #COVID19MA confirmed cases and their close contact to collect crucial data that enables us to continue to push back on the virus.  📞Answer the call from the MA COVID Team:  https://t.co/5UzFqqkvj6  https://t.co/SrMk8hAfQr

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Please keep doing your part to prevent the spread of COVID-19 - together. Massachusetts continues to push back on this virus.   And if you choose to exercise your rights to free speech, please do so peacefully. Thank you to those who marched peacefully.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our first-in-the-nation Community Tracing Collaborative with @PIH is doing important work to connect with confirmed #COVID19MA cases and their closes contacts to help them with next steps + collect crucial data  📞Answer the call from the MA COVID Team  💻  https://t.co/5UzFqqkvj6  https://t.co/rSQDrqprNT

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: ⏩@MassDPH is also releasing a new “Safer At Home” Advisory, which instructs residents to stay at home unless engaging with newly opened activities, as a way to continue limiting the spread of COVID-19.  🏡Read that advisory here:  https://t.co/xmLKbDv6C6

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our first-in-the-nation Community Tracing Collaborative with @PIH is doing important work to connect with confirmed #COVID19MA cases and their closes contacts to help them with next steps + collect crucial data.  📞Answer the call from the MA COVID Team  💻 https://t.co/5UzFqqkvj6  https://t.co/YdS6iS8MwF

tweet: The Community Tracing Collaborative is connecting with confirmed cases of #COVID19MA and their close contacts. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Contact tracers are making thousands of calls, and we urge residents to answer the call from the MA COVID Team. Look for area codes 833 or 857. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our Community Tracing Collaborative with @PIH has over 1,600 people making calls. Since the effort launched, they've connected with nearly 14,000 confirmed cases and reached out to more than 7,500 of their contacts.  Help us trace #COVID19MA: Pick up when the MA COVID Team calls!  https://t.co/TuqqXpjSfa

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our Community Tracing Collaborative with @PIH is a nation-leading effort to trace and track #COVID19MA so we can further push back against this virus.  Help out by answering the phone when the MA COVID Team calls from an 833 or 857 number.  📞Learn more:  https://t.co/5UzFqqkvj6  https://t.co/P6SA3Rx4eC

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: #COVID19MA | Massachusetts' incredible health care workforce has stepped up to support expanded capacity for COVID-19.  ➡️Learn more about opportunities for health and human services professionals to support temporary care sites across the Commonwealth:   https://t.co/aMYlc7mqUF

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our contact tracing effort with @PIH has already made contact with over 5,000 contacts of #COVID19MA cases.  Please pick up the phone if the MA COVID Team calls. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: ➡️If you receive a call from the Tracing Collaborative, please pick up. Kennealy continues to meet with a wide range of stakeholders.  https://t.co/OLi2pxUick

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: #COVID19MA | Today we announced further actions to continue to address COVID-19 in nursing homes:  ➡️Another $130 million for nursing homes to pay for more staff, infection control + PPE  ➡️Expanded staffing resources building on work by @TheNationsFirst + clinical response teams  https://t.co/xn0NvWZbtI

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Thanks to leaders from @TuftsMedicalCtr, @newtonwellesley and @Baystate_Health for joining us today to outline the preparation we've done with our hospitals to ensure they're ready for COVID-19. That work has enabled hospitals to be in a position to continue to care for patients.  https://t.co/JJAtpgnJS1

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today we joined leaders from the Commonwealth's health care system to make clear: Thanks to our shared work to prepare and build capacity, MA's hospitals are well-positioned to care for both the uptick in COVID-19 patients and people who have other medical problems.  🏥#COVID19MA  https://t.co/OdrQu3yaUD

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Community health centers are deeply rooted in the neighborhoods they serve and are well-positioned to help test, trace and push back against COVID-19.  Pleased to announce a partnership whereby @QuestDX is shipping thousands of test kits to an initial 12 community health centers.  https://t.co/hxnQ9HdKo3

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: On this 50th #EarthDay, we reflect on our commitment to protecting our planet and our Commonwealth's incredible natural resources, even as we work together to confront COVID-19 and keep our residents safe and healthy.  https://t.co/RMpstFVqh0

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: 📰via @nytimes: "An Army of Coronavirus Tracers Takes Shape in Massachusetts"  https://t.co/9ioivIVorK  ➡️Learn more about our contact tracing partnership with @PIH, which will enable us to better understand and push back against COVID-19:  https://t.co/5UzFqqC6aE  #COVID19MA  https://t.co/zSHhQlbbLJ

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Grateful to @NYGovCuomo and our neighbors in New York for lending 400 ventilators to support Massachusetts' health care system during COVID-19. We look forward to distributing these devices to health care facilities soon.  #COVID19MA  https://t.co/P3b23LX39F

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: This morning, I joined @FaceTheNation and spoke with @margbrennan about our Administration's work to build a comprehensive contact tracing program for Massachusetts with @PIH and our collaboration with neighboring states on our regional response to COVID-19.  #COVID19MA  https://t.co/B6F3I3K82E

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Rigorous contract tracing programs, like the one Massachusetts is launching with the team of experts at @PIH, are crucial not only as we seek to understand COVID-19 and slow its spread, but also as we eventually start thinking about re-opening. #COVID19MA   https://t.co/X6XJ64IRea

tweet: Thanks to the @CityOfBoston, @MassConvention, @MassEMA and @PartnersNews, which is leading the clinical effort here. tweet: The most important thing you can do to slow the spread of COVID-19 is to #StayHome.  @MassDPH's stay-at-home advisory remains in effect. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Staying home is the best way that we can slow the spread of COVID-19 and save lives.  Residents should stay home and avoid going outside except for essential activities, like going to the grocery store or pharmacy.  🏡MORE:  https://t.co/n0UazOswvI  https://t.co/qjgnkbWa87

name: Charlie Baker

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: At today's #COVID19MA update, we announced:  ➡️An additional $800 million at MassHealth in critical stabilization funding to support health care providers impacted by and responding to COVID-19  ➡️A nursing home mobile testing program supported by @MassDPH and @TheNationsFirst  https://t.co/D2c5I8iMPa

name: Charlie Baker

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today our administration and @CVSHealth announced the launch of a new CVS rapid testing site in Lowell, which will enable on-the-spot COVID-19 testing and results at no cost. name: Charlie Baker

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: As someone who has visited the Holyoke Soldiers' Home on many occasions to catch up with staff and residents, I am heartbroken by today’s news. The loss of these residents to COVID-19 is a shuddering loss for us all.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: On #NationalDoctorsDay, the Commonwealth is profoundly grateful for the selfless service of the medical professionals on the front-lines of the COVID-19 crisis. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our administration is taking rapid steps to protect residents' health + safety and mitigate the spread of COVID-19:  🏫Suspending schools for 3 weeks 👥Limiting most gatherings to 25 people 💼Unemployment changes to assist workers  ...and more.  🔗DETAILS:  https://t.co/kjShKREJL8  https://t.co/ouup4oJBs2

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: LIVE COVID-19 Update:  https://t.co/OSLR1s1E7f

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: I thank the House of Representatives for quickly passing HR 6021, the Families First Coronavirus Response Act, and urge the Senate to pass the legislation. This will bring crucial resources to Massachusetts as we respond to COVID-19.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Everyone has a role to play to mitigate the spread of COVID-19, and it’s important we take precautions to keep older adults and those with health conditions safe.  This week, we issued new policies restricting visitors to nursing homes + rest homes.  🔗:  https://t.co/adIHbaJG0I  https://t.co/SHiL6L54uu

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: ☎️We have activated @Mass_211 to support residents throughout the ongoing response to COVID-19.  Massachusetts residents can call 2⃣1⃣1⃣ at any time for real-time COVID-19 information, resources and referrals in multiple languages.  🔗MORE via @MassDPH:  https://t.co/4si3pdLazb  https://t.co/azB0XhKjqk

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Earlier, we made several announcements related to our COVID-19 response:  🌐Launched new COVID-19 Response Command Center led by @MassHHS Sec. Sudders:  https://t.co/8AdF2nxZpd  🏥Announced new clinical testing protocols:  https://t.co/bp1DeFS8tB  ▶️VIDEO:  https://t.co/xVSwz7m1BA

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: We are committed to serving the needs of residents as we address the COVID-19 outbreak.  That’s why I directed @MassHHS to issue guidance so @MassHealth members can access the services they need to be tested + treated for COVID-19.   https://t.co/O1YmAqngYv  https://t.co/m8suwNH0xL  https://t.co/e0ICkIOPcU

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Our administration has been working for weeks to address the outbreak of COVID-19, and with today's launch of a new Response Command Center, we are taking an important step in our continuing planning and preparedness efforts.  🔗MORE:  https://t.co/8AdF2nxZpd  https://t.co/aYI4jTquTu

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today I joined @MassLtGov+@MassHHS Sec. Sudders for an update on our COVID-19 response:  👥Prohibited most gatherings of 250+ people:  https://t.co/IFYXIB4tX1  🏫Issued new school guidance:  https://t.co/LtUBe0gzjY  ☎️Activated 211:  https://t.co/4si3pdLazb   https://t.co/FlbvauCH39

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today I ordered the Department of Public Utilities to protect ratepayers and prevent utilities from shutting off residents’ power during this state of emergency, as we continue to take comprehensive action to respond to COVID-19.  MORE:  https://t.co/hwipDYgzHn

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today I issued an emergency order prohibiting most gatherings of over 250 people in an effort to limit the spread of COVID-19. Everyone has a role to play in stopping the spread of the Coronavirus and with this new order, we further efforts to mitigate the spread of this disease.  https://t.co/O7Cd2V2qiO

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Postponing the Marathon is an incredibly difficult thing to do, but we have seen before that the Boston Marathon and this city define "resilient."  We will continue to take steps to keep our communities and Commonwealth safe as we address COVID-19.  https://t.co/s9foAB5Qhy

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: From @MassDPH: Take steps to prevent the spread of COVID-19 and other respiratory diseases:  🤲Wash your hands often 🧴 Clean surfaces that are frequently touched 🏡 Stay at home if you're sick 🗒️ Plan ahead for caring for yourself + loved ones  🔗:  https://t.co/qI3H4jpJ0o  https://t.co/K2E2wTsP4M

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: We continue to support local communities as the Commonwealth works together to address the COVID-19 outbreak.  Today @MassLtGov and I met with Pittsfield’s @MayorTyer + area legislators to discuss our shared response in the Berkshires.  🔗MORE via @MassDPH  https://t.co/qI3H4jpJ0o  https://t.co/9nHxbhW3vF

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: We continue to monitor and respond to the COVID-19 outbreak. Today I spoke with our Cabinet about steps our agencies are taking to keep the Commonwealth safe and healthy. And I spoke with @UMass leaders and nursing home operators about guidance to protect students + older adults.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Residents should continue to visit @MassDPH's website on COVID-19, which includes the latest information and updates for individuals, municipalities, health care professionals, schools and others.  🔗:  https://t.co/8xHOKoF3b9  https://t.co/7QjvOSfRMa

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today, I have declared a state of emergency in Massachusetts to further support our response to COVID-19.
